name: Nine Ice Blocks
description:
Nine Ice Block is a Free Sudoku Block Game. It combines the sudoku and classic block puzzles. 

It is easy to play but challenging to hit a highscore. Brain training game, suitable for all ages.

This is a  logic puzzle game where you need to place a randomly got multiple shapes on a 9 x 9 board.

The aim is to fit the shapes to suitable empty places and create 9 block in a row, or in a column, or as a 3x3 block, since that case these ice cube blocks will disappear. You can get a multiple point for a combo hit, when you create more than one 9-block (horizontal, vertical, 3x3) with one placement.

The game ends when you cannot place the actual shape(s) since you there is no proper empty place

If you accidentally misplace the tile of shapes you have a chance to undo the last movement, however it is not possible when new shapes have been already appeared.

By playing this game and achieve a certen challenging points you are rewarded a different type of in-game coins or a diamond.

There is no time limit. 9 Ice Blocks assures a relaxing gaming environment for players without time pressure. Just enjoy the elimination of blocks! :)

This game is really in early phase, so any suggestion would be highly appreciated and can be considered as an improvement in the upcoming updates.

Planned fetures:
